newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARIAN OPPOSITION MP KILLED IN FAMILY DISPUTE.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARIAN OPPOSITION MP KILLED IN FAMILY DISPUTE.

text.p: A Hungarian opposition MP was stabbed to death on Friday evening by his son-in-law who since admitted the murder.
Miklos K. Csontos (66), member of parliament of the opposition Smallholders Party, was killed by Emil K. (35), who arrived home drunk on Friday evening, Hungarian news agency MTI reported.
Police said the housekeeper announced the murder and the perpetrator waited at the crime scene for police to arrive and admitted that he stabbed Csontos.
